hero.title: Connect. Share.
hero.subtitle: Hira combines social media with secure messaging. Share public posts, join communities, and chat privately with end-to-end encryption.

features.title: Everything you need for social and secure communication

publicFeeds.title: Public Feeds
publicFeeds.description: Share posts, photos, and updates with your followers. Like, comment, and repost content.

threadedPosts.title: Threaded Posts
threadedPosts.description: Create engaging threaded conversations and reply to posts with nested comments.

encryptedChat.title: Encrypted Chat
encryptedChat.description: Private 1:1 and group chats protected by end-to-end encryption for maximum security.

communities.title: Communities
communities.description: Join interest-based communities and connect with like-minded people worldwide.

liveStreaming.title: Live Streaming
liveStreaming.description: Host live video sessions with real-time chat interaction and audience engagement.

contentDiscovery.title: Content Discovery
contentDiscovery.description: Discover trending hashtags, popular posts, and recommended users through smart algorithms.

selfDestructing.title: Self-Destructing Messages
selfDestructing.description: Send messages that automatically delete after a set time for enhanced privacy.

voiceCalls.title: Voice & Video Calls
voiceCalls.description: Make encrypted voice and video calls with crystal-clear quality to individuals or groups.

chatFolders.title: Chat Folders
chatFolders.description: Organize your conversations with custom folders and tabs for better chat management.

download.title: Download Hira
download.subtitle: Available exclusively on mobile devices
download.mobileDescription: Hira is designed specifically for mobile devices to provide the best social and messaging experience on the go.

social.title: Connect with communities worldwide
social.subtitle: Discover, share, and engage with content that matters to you

publicPosts.title: Public Posts & Stories
publicPosts.description: Share your thoughts, photos, and videos with your followers through posts and temporary stories.

trendingHashtags.title: Trending Hashtags
trendingHashtags.description: Stay up-to-date with trending topics and discover new content through popular hashtags.

userProfiles.title: Rich User Profiles
userProfiles.description: Customize your profile with bio, profile picture, banner, and verified handles.

algorithmicFeed.title: Smart Content Feed
algorithmicFeed.description: Discover new users and posts tailored to your interests through intelligent recommendations.

security.title: Your privacy is our priority
security.subtitle: Hira is designed with your privacy in mind. All personal conversations and social interactions are protected by default encryption.

endToEnd.title: End-to-End Encryption
endToEnd.description: All private messages and calls are encrypted, ensuring only you and your contacts can read them.

twoStep.title: Two-Step Verification
twoStep.description: Secure your account with two-factor authentication using OTP or email verification.

anonymity.title: Username Privacy
anonymity.description: Use Hira with just a username - no phone number required for maximum anonymity.

security.learnMore: Learn more about Hira privacy and security →

statistics.title: Growing fast worldwide
statistics.subtitle: Join millions of users who trust Hira for their social and private communications
